section.name: Getting Started with JAMSEL
section.p: This document (as well as the others in this section) provide an introduction to JAMSEL and how to use it within a project. For those that have already skimmed the documentation on this site, you may be asking yourself, what *exactly* does it mean to use JAMSEL? These documents attempt to illustrate how one might install, integrate and leverage the power of JAMSEL in a project.

To avoid overwhelming you (user, developer, or contributor) with unnecessary information, this document attempts to provide references to various documents depending upon your interests. It is meant to provide you with a starting point that can be effectively used to get to the information you need without going through all of the documentation on the site, which might be a little overwhelming.

subsection.name: Overview of the Getting Started Documentation

tr.td: Before you can start using JAMSEL in any form, you'll have to download the JAMSEL distribution to your system (unless you plan on building JAMSEL from source). This document provides links to the various distributions available.

After you have downloaded a distribution, you'll need to install it on your system before you can start using JAMSEL (unless you plan on building JAMSEL from source). This document provides step-by-step instructions on the installation process.

For those of you that have been referred to this document because you are trying to build a JAMSEL-enabled project, this document will provide you with all of the necessary information required to build any JAMSEL-enabled project.
